ygData.subject: Neo BeastWars Tigerhawk's Solace
ygData.msgSnippet: Tigerhawk walks away seeing the choice was made 3 times the Rescue thing came up 3 times he Failed Airazor, Tavatron. Climbs up into a Tree.  Where are you

Tigerhawk walks away seeing the choice was made 3 times the Rescue thing came 
up 3 times he Failed Airazor, Tavatron. Climbs up into a Tree.  "Where are 
you when I need you most." 

Airazor Calls out "You still think about me don't you?"

Tigerhawk Grins  "Everyday."

Airazor laughs  "Its Nice to Know you still thing about me but the time I 
spend with you I was the happiest but you have to move on even if it mean 
only to be hurt again its time for letting go. Some else needs you we will be 
together soon enough."

TigerHawk  Sits in tree I "You better wait for me too." Tigerhawk Feel 
complete know that Airazor is at peace.
